name: Tentación de Adeptus

normal.description: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine, in which specially selected ingredients are submerged and slowly bowled into soup stock. The recipe scribbled from memory alone was enough to urge the adepti to once again return to the world of men.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 316 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

delicious.description: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. This dish is a rare and exquisite mix of both land and sea, combining countless delicious delicacies in one flavor-filled pot. Each mouthful is a moment to remember — it's even irresistible enough to entice the adepti down from their celestial abode.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 372 and CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. Without having mastered the art of simmering, the resulting stew-like dish has a salty, fishy taste. But, just considering the costly ingredients will be enough to keep you going until the pot's empty.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 260 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

effect: Aumenta el ataque de los miembros del equipo en 260/316/372 y la probabilidad crítica un 8/10/12% durante 300s

name: Sándwich del aventurero

normal.description: A nutritious egg dish. Luxurious mayonnaise sits atop a lining of ham and poached egg toast. The smooth mouthfeel fills you with energy for the long road ahead, and is one of the Adventurers' Guild's top-rated breakfasts.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s.

delicious.description: A nutritious egg dish. The mayonnaise rises like the sun over the rippling poached egg's surface, and the exquisite mouthfeel really hits the spot. The unique salty flavor of the ham cuts right through the mix as well, like light parting the gathered clouds.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s.

suspicious.description: A nutritious egg dish. The congealed mayonnaise is almost solid, and it is lined with tough ham and over-boiled egg. At least wolfing it down will make you full all the same.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s.

description: Un plato de huevo muy nutritivo. Jamón y huevo cocido sobre una rebanada de pan, cubierto por una cremosa salsa mayonesa. Su delicioso sabor proporciona suficiente motivación para salir de aventura. ¡Por algo es el desayuno más popular en el Gremio de Aventureros!.
effect: Aumenta el ATQ de todos los miembros del equipo 160-228 pts durante 300s.

name: Delicia del campo
effect: Restaura 26% de la Vida máxima para todos los miembros del equipo y regenera 570 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Tofu de Almendras

normal.description: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s.

delicious.description: A dessert made from ground almonds. It has the exquisite look and texture of that of a piece of white jade, and could pass as an art piece — so much so that you could not entertain the idea of actually eating it.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s.

suspicious.description: A dessert made from ground almonds. The almond milk is chilled without being properly ground and strained. You can only lie to yourself that its rough texture is what makes it special.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s.

description: Postre elaborado a base de almendras trituradas. La forma es exquisita y el color es como la manteca. Es como una obra maestra, uno no puede evitar sentirse mal por comerlo.
effect: Aumenta el ataque de todos los miembros del equipo en 66/81/95 durante 300s.

name: Sidra de manzana
description: Una bebida sin alcohol recién exprimida, elegante y afrutada. Se dice que tiene un fuerte efecto aleccionador, los clientes de la taberna a menudo piden esto como la última bebida de la noche.
effect: Restaura el 26% del HP máximo a todos los miembros del grupo y regenera 570 HP cada 5 segundos durante 30 segundos.

name: Puchero de Barbatos verdadero
effect: Disminuye el consumo de aguante del equipo al planear y correr un 25% durante 1800s.

name: A Prize Catch
description: Especialidad de Tartaglia. Parece una bestia atrapada flotando en un océano de sangre, su agonía es un grito inaudible ... Pero Tartaglia sonríe y explica que esto es algo que sacó del mar, con algunos productos de su tierra a un lado.
effect: Aumenta la defensa de todos los miembros del equipo en 282 durante 300s.

name: Sopa de brotes de bambú

normal.description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The meat and ham have been diced into small pieces, and the soup has been kept on low heat till it turned milky white. The process has brought out the distinct flavors of both kinds of meat, making for an especially tasty soup.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. One whiff is enough to whet one's appetite greatly, and the concentrated flavors fill your body with every spoonful of soup. It is almost like spreading a pair of wings and walking on clouds.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

suspicious.description: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The inexpert heat control has caused the fresh meat to be a bit tough, and the salty ham has covered the expected taste. The bamboo shoots, which have absorbed the flavors of both meats, are probably the only acceptable part of this dish.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

description: Un caldo hervido durante mucho tiempo. El mero olor abre el apetito y, al probar la primera cucharada, el intenso sabor se extiende por todo el cuerpo. Es como extender tus alas y volar hacia el alba entre nubes fragantes.
effect: Restaura 26/28/30% de la Vida máxima del personaje seleccionado. Regenera 450/620/790 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Puchero de Barbatos

normal.description: A simple chowder with a long history. The ingredients are similarly traditional and simple. No matter where you are, a piping-hot chowder of this sort can always give you a sense of real and unsurpassed satisfaction.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A simple chowder with a long history. After much careful stewing, the flavors of three different vegetables have been blended to perfection. Like this, it is not hard to imagine why someone once called it "the best chowder I've ever tasted."
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A simple chowder with a long history. Though the Anemo Archon is said to symbolize freedom, perhaps this dish has been a bit too liberal in the making. Perhaps the name Stormy Stew might be more fitting here.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' gliding and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

description: Una sopa simple con una larga historia. Después de un guisado muy cuidadoso, los sabores de tres verduras diferentes se han mezclado a la perfección. No es difícil imaginar por qué alguien alguna vez lo llamó  "la mejor sopa que he probado".
effect: Disminuye el consumo del aguante de los miembros del equipo al planear y correr un 15/20/25% durante 900s.

name: Ráfaga de bayas y menta
description: Una bebida sin alcohol recién exprimida, elegante y afrutada. Una refrescante explosión de Menta con Bayas para endulzar el trato, tiene un aroma exquisito.
effect: Aumenta la tasa CRIT de todos los miembros del grupo en un 16 % durante 300 segundos.

name: Estofado de perca de lomo negro

normal.description: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.description: A poached fish dish. The fish fillets are so tender and juicy that they almost seem to come alive in your mouth. The sense of loss is so unbearable when you swallowed a piece down that you just had to treat yourself to another piece.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

suspicious.description: A poached fish dish. It has essentially lost all the taste of fish itself to the spicy taste of chili peppers. Only a selected few enjoy such a sensory overload on their tongues.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

description: Un plato de pescado hervido. Cuando los pedazos de pescado se deslizan entre los labios y la lengua, es como si fueran a saltar en cualquier momento: Al pasarlo genera una sensación de vacío en el paladar que hacen querer probar un bocado más.
effect: Restaura 26/28/30% de la vida máxima del personaje seleccionado y regenera 450/620/790 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Sopa de Marisco

normal.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The delicacy of crab and mint make for a clear soup, and the calla lily brings it a refreshing taste.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s.

delicious.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The crab, mint and calla lily come together perfectly to dance on your tongue. It reminds you of playing barefoot by the lake in summer.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s.

suspicious.description: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s.

description: Una equilibrada y rica combinación de mariscos. El cangrejo, la menta y el Lirio cala recrean en tu boca un día de verano soleado junto al mar.
effect: Aumenta la defensa de todos los miembros del equipo en 165/200/235 durante 300s.

name: Brocheta de champiñones y pollo

normal.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. Fresh poultry is complimented by fragrant mushrooms. Don't be picky, chow down!
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and 1,000 HP to the selected character.

delicious.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. All the best the wild has to offer are pierced on just one stick.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and 1,200 HP to the selected character.

suspicious.description: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and 800 HP to the selected character.

description: Una brocheta de champiñones y pollo. Todo lo mejor que la naturaleza tiene para ofrecer unido en una misma brocheta.
effect: Restaura 8/9/10% de la Vida Máxima y 800/1000/1200 pts. de Vida para el personaje seleccionado.

name: Plato de carnes frías

normal.description: A plate of cold cut meat. An equal balance of bacon, ham and sausage keeps everyone happy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s.

delicious.description: A plate of cold cut meat. The seasoning is just delightful enough to bring out the flavors perfectly. With a mouth full of meaty ecstasy, one worries about nothing.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s.

description: Un plato de carne fría adobada. Las extrañas especias utilizadas en la combinación de tres tipos de carne ofrecen el mejor sabor, incluso haciendo que la gente olvide sus problemas.
effect: Aumenta el daño físico de todos los miembros del equipo un 20/30/40% durante 300s.

name: Fideos fríos con delicias de la montaña
description: Especialidad de Chongyun. Aunque estos fideos primaverables serían irresistibles en el verano, Chongyun insiste en comerlos en los fríos inviernos. Qué sujeto..
effect: Recupera 80 puntos de aguante.

name: ¡Ven por ello!

normal.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s.

delicious.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. The mixture of meat and vegetables is spot-on, the presentation is flawless, and the blend of flavors in the broth brings out the best of everything. Don't mind if I do.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients... dumped into scalding-hot water and boiled beyond recognition. As if the taste of everything and nothing at the same time isn't bad enough, you'll want to watch out for the sand, too...
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

description: Un plato hecho con una lujosa variedad de ingredientes. La mezcla de carne y verduras es perfecta, la presentación es impecable, y la mezcla de sabores en el caldo lo hace increíble. Este plato desaparece en un abrir y cerrar de ojos.
effect: Incrementa la probabilidad crítica de todos los miembros del equipo un 10/15/20% durante 300s.

name: Asado mar y montaña

normal.description: A luxurious bake. Cracks through the golden outer skin reveal a medley of rosy ham and bright vegetables. How tantalizing!
normal.effect: Revives the selected character. Restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.description: A luxurious bake. The scent is so rich and heavenly. You'll only be done once you lick the plate clean.
delicious.effect: Revives the selected character. Restores 1,500 HP.

suspicious.description: A somewhat luxurious looking bake. By looking at it, no-one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.
suspicious.effect: Revives the selected character. Restores 900 HP.

description: Un asado de lujo. El aroma es extremadamente sabroso. ¡Querrás lamer el plato después de haber terminado de comer!.
effect: Revive al personaje seleccionado. Restaura 900/1200/1500 pts. de Vida.

name: Guisado de temporada

normal.description: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.
normal.effect: Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A meat and vegetable stew. These warm, buttery ingredients are so good that you almost want to dive into the cream stew and cuddle up with them.
delicious.effect: Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.
suspicious.effect: Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 15% for 900s.

description: Guiso de carne y verduras. Estos ingredientes calientes y mantecosos se ven tan buenos que casi quieres sumergirte en el jugo y acurrucarte con ellos.
effect: Disminuye el consumo de aguante al correr para todos los miembros del equipo un 15/20/25% durante 900s.

name: Camarón de cristal

normal.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The outer skin is as clear as its crystal namesake, and when it enters the mouth, one's tongue could be forgiven for thinking that the fresh shrimp within is still alive. Those who eat it can only lament that four pieces per serving is far, far too few.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 470 HP every 5s for 30s.

suspicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The dull outer skin has a rather sticky mouthfeel which, when combined with the dry stuffing within, makes this dish a torment best ended sooner.
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 300 HP every 5s for 30s.

description: Uno de los ape se puede perdonar a la lengua por pensar que los camarones frescos aún están vivos. Los comensales solo pueden lamentarse de que cuatro piezas por porción sean muy, muy pocas.
effect: Restaura 20% de la Vida máxima del personaje seleccionado y restaura 390 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Esto no es un aperitivo
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 10% de su vida máxima junto con 150 pts. de Vida adicionales.
base: Pescado a la parrilla de Mondstadt

name: Sabiduría suprema (vida)
effect: Aumenta la Probabilidad Crítica de todos los miembros del equipo un 16% durante 300s.

name: Sinfonía bendita
effect: Aumenta el daño físico del equipo un 55% durante 300s.

name: Tostada del pescador

normal.description: Onion-covered toast. A favorite amongst fishermen, they will stuff a bag with it and sit by the river all day.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s.

delicious.description: Onion-covered toast. Exudes a wonderful aroma. Are the fish biting for the bait, or is it the toast they're after?
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s.

suspicious.description: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s.

description: Tostada cubierta de cebolla. Desprende un aroma increíble. ¿Están los peces buscando el cebo o la tostada?.
effect: Aumenta la DEF de todos los miembros del equipo en 88/107/126 pts. durante 300 s.

name: Tostada de mariscos
description: La especialidad de Klee. A modo de disculpa por usar sin motivo sus bombas para ahuyentar a los peces, Jean instruyó a Klee a  hacer esta tostada para los pescadores.Es llenadora y sabrosa. Klee nunca volverá a morir de hambre, incluso después de un día entero de pesca con bombas..
effect: Aumenta la DEF de todos los miembros del equipo en 151 pts. durante 300 s. En modo Multijugador, solo tendrá efecto en tus propio personajes.

name: Pasta a la boloñesa

normal.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.
normal.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 390 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

delicious.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The beautiful, authentic flavors take you on a culinary adventure from the first bite to the last.
delicious.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 470 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

suspicious.description: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.
suspicious.effect: Restores 18% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

description: Pasta con salsa boloñesa. El intenso y auténtico sabor te transporta a una aventura culinaria desde la primera cucharada.
effect: Restaura 18/20/22% de la Vida máxima de todos los miembros del equipo y regenera 300/390/480 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Tiras de carne salteadas
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 10% de la vida máxima con 150 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Albóndigas de rábano fritas
variant: Lantern Rite Special Fried Radish Balls

normal.description: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s.

delicious.description: Fried Radish Balls. It's insane that something so delicious comes from plain old radishes! All who eat them will truly understand Liyue's culinary reputation.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 95 for 300s.

suspicious.description: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 66 for 300s.

description: Albóndigas de rábano fritas. ¡Es increíble que se pueda crear un sabor tan delicioso con solo rábanos! Solo los que lo han probado entienden la reputación de la cocina de Liyue.
effect: Incrementa el ataque de todos los miembros del equipo en 66/81/95 durante 300s.

name: Brocheta afrutada
effect: Restaura 16% de la Vida máxima para todos los miembros del equipo y 1350 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Rollitos de luna llena

normal.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The egg has been beaten into the flour to form a dough and the shrimp and fish have been diced, minced, and packaged into the shape of a teacup, before being garnished with whole shrimp and steamed in a pot. The resulting design is like that of clouds embracing the moon, hence the name Fullmoon Egg.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Take a bite while it's hot, and have your tastebuds savor the tender minced meat and delicious juice,an experience which is then topped off with a finishing touch of sweet prawn. Before your eyes, you can almost see a full moon over rippling waters, a fishing boat by the shore, and the fishermen's songs echoing down the years.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

suspicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The warped dough wraps the meat stiffly, and the dry mouthfeel leads to the illusion that one is chewing on a giant chunk of gnocchi.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

description: Uno de los bocadillos tradicionales de Liyue. La masa deformada envuelve la carne con rigidez y la sensación de sequedad en la boca lleva a la ilusión de que uno está masticando un trozo gigante de ñoquis.
effect: Revive un personaje y restaura 1200 pts. de Vida

name: Marcha Solemne
description: El plato especial de Hu Tao. Las cabecitas redondas de los espiritus, apiñados juntos, le da una apariencia muy comica. Sin embargo, si te puede la curiosidad y pruebas uno, te arrepentiras durante mucho tiempo... Al fin y al cabo, los ingredientes de este plato proceden de un plano fronterizo y su sabor bombardea tus papilas gustativas con... Puaj, ¿Qué demonios es esto?.
effect: Restaura un 15% de la Vida Max. Y 550 pts. de Vida adicionales al personaje seleccionados.

name: Cangrejo dorado

normal.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The crab has been chopped into pieces and battered with flour, before being stir-fried till golden and rich with flavor. It is worthy of the word "gold," whether in terms of appearance or quality.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s.

delicious.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The aroma of the crab meat inundates the room the instant it leaves the frying pan, and a single bite fills one's palate with the countless rustic flavors of a fishing village hometown. It seems that such simple yet timeless village customs held the secret to this lavish, golden sumptuousness all along.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 308 and healing effects by 10% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The flour granules within have congealed like gravel, and have some crab shell mixed in. But compared to the blandness of the crab meat, the taste of crab shell is at least worth having a go at.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 242 and healing effects by 6% for 300s.

description: Un plato de cangrejo cocinado a la antigua. El aroma de la carne de cangrejo inunda la habitación al instante en que sale de la sartén, y un solo bocado llena el paladar con innumerables sabores rústicos de la ciudad natal de un pueblo pesquero. Parece que las costumbres  del pueblo tan simples pero atemporales guardan el secreto de esta suntuosa opulencia todo este tiempo.
effect: Aumenta la defensa de todos los miembros del equipo por 261 y los efectos curativos por 8 durante 300s.

name: Albóndigas de camarón dorado

normal.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. The aroma assaults your senses, while the crispy potatoes bring out the light sweetness of the shrimp meat. This, in tandem with its cute, small shape, makes it very enticing indeed.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.

delicious.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. From the rich, indulgent scent of crispy golden potato strips, to the satisfying crunch as you take your first bite, to the grand finale of delicious sweet shrimp, this dish is pure pleasure.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 1,500 HP.

suspicious.description: A deep-fried shrimp dish. Hastily cast into hot oil and promptly forgotten about, the result is a disastrous combination of raw shrimp and burnt potato strips.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 900 HP.

description: Un plato de camarones fritos. Desde el rico e indulgente aroma de las crujientes tiras de papa doradas, hasta el satisfactorio crujido al dar el primer bocado, y el gran final de los deliciosos camarones dulces....
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 900/1200/1500 puntos de vida.

name: Carne a la jardinera

normal.description: A steaming-hot stew. Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.
normal.effect: Somewhat decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s.

delicious.description: A steaming-hot stew. Just one spoonful sends a down-to-earth sense of satisfaction welling up from the depths of your heart. The meat's flavor grows with every chew, bringing limitless strength to the eater even in the coldest wintry wastes.
delicious.effect: Decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s.

suspicious.description: A steaming-hot stew. There was some flaw in the flame control during the stewing process, leading to a product with a very stiff mouthfeel. You can ignore those flaws if you scarf it all down - it'll keep the cold away regardless.
suspicious.effect: Slightly decreases the rate of Sheer Cold accumulation for all party members for 900s.

description: Un estofado bien caliente. Está hecho con carne congelada, verduras cortadas en pequeños trozos y un espeso caldo de tomates hervidos durante mucho tiempo. Basta con una cucharada de este agradable y cálido estofado para quitarse el frío del cuerpo..
effect: Disminuye la velocidad con que se acumula Frío extremo para todos los miembros del equipo durante ???/900/???s.

name: Pez tigre a la parrilla
variant: Pescado a la parrilla del superviviente

normal.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly picked and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP and an additional 1,000 HP.

delicious.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The shimmering golden skin has locked the fresh and tender meat in. You cannot help but sigh in satisfaction as you chew on it. Not a scrap of meat here will go uneaten, not even those stuck firmly to the bamboo stick.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP.

suspicious.description: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. You can barely see that this charred lump is indeed grilled fish, and upon further investigation, the fish scales mixed in confirm that this is indeed the case.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP and an additional 800 HP.

description: Una brocheta de pescado a las brasas. Este pescado fue capturado directamente desde el puerto, lo que garantiza su frescor. Fue ligeramente marinado y rápidamente asado. Su aroma atrae a los gatos callejeros. De hecho, la frescura es el secreto de su sabor. En sus orígenes, el Pez tigre a la parrilla se preparaba exclusivamente con Pez ticker, pero después comenzaron a llamarlo Pez tigre y este nombre empezó a usarse para referirse a cualquier plato de pescado a la parrilla. De hecho, la población de Pez ticker ha ido disminuyendo con el tiempo y hoy en día está casi extinguido.
effect: Restaura 8/9/10% de la vida máxima y 800/1000/1200 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Agua bendita
description: Una botella de líquido transparente, incoloro y sin contaminantes. Indistinguible del agua de manantial ordinaria. Puede que valga la pena o no poner todas sus esperanzas en ello.
effect: Regenera 1 HP cada segundo durante 20 segundos.

name: Pizza vigorizante
effect: Restaura 34% de la Vida máxima del personaje seleccionado. Regenera 980 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Rollito de jade

normal.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The ham's sweetness is locked inside the fresh vegetables, drizzled with a spicy broth. Delicious is an understatement.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

delicious.description: An exquisite-looking dish. The sweetness of ham and the crisp lotus seeds are a match made in heaven. The aromatic broth pours down like the dawning light, caressing your tongue with an unworldly delicious taste.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 320 and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

suspicious.description: An exquisite-looking dish. Food ingredients of different degrees of doneness are wrapped in shriveled vegetables. It looks depressing to say the least.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 224 and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s.

description: Un plato de aspecto exquisito. La dulzura del jamón y las crujientes semillas de loto son una combinación perfecta hecha en el cielo. El caldo aromático se derrama como la luz del amanecer, acariciando tu lengua con un sabor delicioso y fuera  de este mundo.
effect: Aumenta el ataque de todos los miembros del equipo en 224/272/320 y la probabilidad crítica un 6/8/10% durante 300s.

name: Estofado de gemas

normal.description: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 107 for 300s.

delicious.description: A simple vegetable soup. The mild-tasting soup is filled with the fragrance of fresh vegetables. This down-to-earth and heart-warming soup can rival any luxurious dish.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 126 for 300s.

suspicious.description: A simple vegetable soup. The bland soup and dull vegetables remind you of the dying vegetables on abandoned and barren farmlands.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 88 for 300s.

description: Una sopa de verduras simple. Una sopa caliente cuyo aroma penetra en las fosas nasales. Este manjar dulce es digno de servirse en un tazón de jade.
effect: Aumenta la defensa de todos los miembros del equipo en 88/107/126 durante 300s.

name: Pollo al chile Jueyun

normal.description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The finesse technique used in mixing the dish retained the freshness of the delightful juice contained within the chicken. The glowing gold chicken skin hides a mildly hot flavor underneath.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s.

delicious.description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The chicken is extremely tender, juicy, and sweet. The delicious taste transports you to the realm of dreams.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s.

suspicious.description: Cold chicken mixed in dressings. The chicken probably isn't properly marinated, so it's only salty on the outside but bland on the inside. The taste reminds you of water-poached chicken breasts.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s.

description: Un plato de pollo frío. La carne es tan tierna que casi se puede deshacer con el viento. Con solo mordisquearlo desprende su jugo. Es como una frontera entre lo real y lo fantástico: una experiencia astral.
effect: Aumenta la Probabilidad Crítica de todos los miembros del equipo un 6/9/12% durante 300s.

name: Guoba de Jueyun

normal.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Stir-fried ham and Jueyun Chili sprinkled on a crispy crust made from Rice and Horsetail create a refined, meaty snack that transforms humble Rice into a hot delicacy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% for 300s.

delicious.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. Chow down on that lovely, fragrant crust and the steaming ham sitting atop it. The spices and spiciness race neck and neck into your nostrils, creating an addictive flavor that has you licking that last finger rather than let a single scrap go to waste.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 40% for 300s.

suspicious.description: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. The browned Jueyun Chilis and ham stick together on top of a crust that has barely retained its flavor, and you can only tell them apart by the mouthfeel.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 20% for 300s.

description: Uno de los aperitivos típicos de Liyue. Se frien los chiles de Jueyun y el jamón y se vierten encima de la mezcla de arroz crujiente y cola de caballo. La combinación de la carne y el sabor picante convierte a un ingrediente tan cotidiano como el arroz en una comida tan sabrosa... {Falta}.
effect: Aumenta el Daño Físico de todos los miembros del equipo un 20-40% durante 300s.

name: Panqueques esponjosos
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 15% de la Vida máxima, con 550 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Pastelillo de loto

normal.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. Sweet stuffed lotus wrapped in a crispy, deep-fried crust. Its layers of flower petals unravel perfectly in the palm of your hand.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 200 for 300s.

delicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The flower petals waver to life if you gently blow on them. As you close your eyes and take a bite, a luscious flavor covers your tastebuds like a sweet harmony of blooming flowers and fluttering birds in the breeze.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 235 for 300s.

suspicious.description: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The lotus petals have lost their original color, turning brown and wilted under the merciless heat of hot oil.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 165 for 300s.

description: Uno de los pastelillos típicos de Liyue. Inspira con cuidado y observa cómo los pétalos se mueven ligeramente, como si tuvieran vida propia. Al cerrar los ojos y morder un pedazo, el dulce sabor inunda tu paladar. Es como si soplara el viento, las flores se abrieran y los pajaros se lanzaran al vuelo.
effect: Aumenta la defensa de los miembros del equipo en 165/200/235 durante 300s.

name: Sopa de loto y huevo
variant: Lantern Rite Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

normal.description: A steaming egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members'sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A steaming egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members'sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A steaming egg dish. The lengthy steaming process has caused unusual honeycomb figure to appear on the surface of the egg custard. It goes without saying that there isn't hardly a hint of bitterness left in the lotus.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members'sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

description: Un plato de huevos al vapor. Los suculentos huevos se derriten en la boca, y antes de que te des cuenta, una suave y sutil dulzura de las recién brotadas flores de loto cubre tus papilas gustativas.
effect: Disminuye el consumo de aguante de los miembros del equipo al correr un 15/20/25% durante 900s.

name: Rollo de carne con matsutake

normal.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP.

delicious.description: A pan-fried meat dish. It combines the essences of the mountains and the nourishments of the celestial bodies. It is a very nutritious dish that will surely bring a smile to your face.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP.

suspicious.description: A pan-fried meat dish. Though the dry and tough texture is miles away from what it could be, the Matsutake is too nutritious to let it go to waste.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP.

description: Un plato de carne salteada. La esencia de los bosques y montañas, y los nutrientes que dan el sol y la luna convergen en este plato, trayendo no solo una rica nutrición sino también una felicidad desbordante.
effect: Restaura 20/22/24% de la Vida Máxima y 900/1200/1500 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Pescado a la parrilla de Mondstadt

normal.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, making it completely dry and crispy. The sprinkled pepper on top brings out the freshness of the fish.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire, locking the delicious juices inside the meat under the crispy skin. A small bite is all that's needed to unlock its wondrous and delicious taste.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

suspicious.description: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

description: Brochetas de pescado a la parrilla a fuego lento. Después de asarse, la grasa se distribuye delicadamente entre la piel crujiente y la carne tierna y suave. Un simple mordisco trae un bocado de alegría.
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 50/100/150 pts. de Vida

name: Tortilla de papas de Mondstadt
variant: Tortilla de papas en forma de garra

normal.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP.

delicious.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP.

suspicious.description: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP.

description: Tortilla de papas frita. Cierra los ojos y siente la brisa ligera y dulce que Mondstadt puede ofrecerte.
effect: Restaura 30/32/34% de la Vida máxima y 600/1250/1900 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Pastelillo de luna

normal.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 30% and DEF by 200 for 300s.

delicious.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. As you cut a slice off this small meat pie, the aromas of butter and meat assault your senses simultaneously. The rustic, sweet mouthfeel reminds you of the sights and sounds of harvest festivals, bringing a smile unbidden to your face.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 35% and DEF by 235 for 300s.

suspicious.description: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. The burnt-yellow meringue looks barely passable. Don't let any Mondstadt locals see you dead with this thing, or they might just take it upon themselves to ensure that you never fail again.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield Strength by 25% and DEF by 165 for 300s.

description: Una comida típica de Mondstadt. La carne marinada es muy sabrosa y se conserva dulce y jugosa tras ser asada en el hojaldre. Es un componente esencial en las festividades de Mondstadt..
effect: Aumenta la Protección de Escudo de todos los miembros del equipo en un 25%-35% y su DEF 165-235 pts. durante 300s.

name: Carne de Mora

normal.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside of a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside of a pastry. With a crispy crust and tender meat, this legendary delicacy is so succulent that not even Mora laid in front of you could distract you from enjoying it.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

suspicious.description: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside of a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

description: Una cantidad generosa de carne picada tierna con una corteza crujiente. Un solo bocado es suficiente para extasiarse. Con su sabor legendario, ni un montón de Mora distrae al comensal.
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 50/100/150 puntos de vida.

name: Pizza de champiñones

normal.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm the cheese stretches out long, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
normal.effect: Restores 28% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 620 HP every 5s for 30s.

delicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.
delicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 790 HP every 5s for 30s.

suspicious.description: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.
suspicious.effect: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

description: Una pizza con queso y champiñones. Es una fiesta de sabores en la boca.
effect: Restaura 28% de la Vida máxima del personaje seleccionado. Regenera 450/620/790 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.

name: Pasta a la boloñesa misteriosa
description: La especialidad de Lisa, con una aurora inexplicable, esta salsa boloñesa es tan exótica que nunca tendrás suficiente. ¿Habrá Lisa hechizado este plato?.
effect: Restaura 26% de vida Máx al personaje seleccionado y regenera 570 pts. de Vida cada 5 s  durante 30 s.

name: Fideos con delicias de montaña
variant: Fideos fríos con delicias de la montaña

normal.description: Noodles in a meat-and-vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.
normal.effect: Restores 50 Stamina.

delicious.description: Noodles in a meat-and-vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles has absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.
delicious.effect: Restores 60 Stamina.

suspicious.description: Noodles in a meat-and-vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.
suspicious.effect: Restores 40 Stamina.

effect: Restaura 40/50/60 de aguante.

name: Estofado de carne y manzana del norte

normal.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat goes down smooth, its flavor dense, and when cut open, the meat juice that flows out bears traces of apple flavoring. An eye-popping, refreshing dish indeed.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP.

delicious.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. The meat is juicy in the extreme, and no matter how much of it you eat, you still want more. The way every breath you take is tinged with the flavor of apples reminds you of nothing so much as lying in an apple orchard.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP.

suspicious.description: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP.

description: Un estofado de carne y manzana. La carne es jugosa y dulce y al terminarla deseas poder comer más. Es como si estuvieras en un huerto repleto de manzanos y el olor afrutado impregnara el aire que respiras.
effect: Restaura 30/32/34% de la vida máxima y 600/1250/1900 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Pollo ahumado del Norte

normal.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A staple for Northerners, often made for honored guests.
normal.effect: Restores 50 Stamina.

delicious.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. A dish fit for a King. Go on, find one and serve him with pride.
delicious.effect: Restores 60 Stamina.

suspicious.description: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. It's true. You really ought to try your own cooking before serving it to your guests. It's not too late to make a new one, perhaps?
suspicious.effect: Restores 40 Stamina.

description: Pollo ahumado acompañado de verduras. Un plato digno de un rey. ¡Quien tenga la suerte de probarlo, se quedará boquiabierto!.
effect: Restaura 40/50/60 de aguante.

name: Sin futuro
effect: Incrementa la probabilidad crítica de todos los miembros del equipo un 20% y el daño crítico un 20% durante 300s.

name: Comida nutritiva
effect: Revive al personaje seleccionado. Restaura 20% de la vida máxima y 1200 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Érase una vez en Mondstadt
effect: Aumenta la probabilidad crítica del equipo un 20% y el daño crítico un 20% durante 300s.

name: Filete de la Caballera
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 10% de la Vida máxima, con 150 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Torre de Ludi

normal.description: A rich, meaty dish. Originally a Mondstadt dish made of steaks, potatoes, and cheese, it has since become synonymous with Ludi Harpastum.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 15% for 300s.

delicious.description: A rich, meaty dish. Piled in just the right way to be both aesthetically pleasing and delicious all the way through. I wonder if we can pile it a little higher...
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 20% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A rich, meaty dish. The meat must have been stacked wrong... Yeah, that's it. Now, can this actually be served...?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

description: Un plato con mucha carne. La carne está amontonada de tal forma que complace tanto la vista como el paladar. Me pregunto si sería posible hacerlo un poco más alto....
effect: Aumenta la Probabilidad Crítica de todos los miembros del equipo un 10/15/20% durante 300s.

name: Tazón de té
description: Té de Liyue. Después de una agotadora caminata por la vasta región de Liyue, no hay nada más rejuvenecedor que un gran trago de té de Pop's Teas.
effect: Restaura el 14% de Max HP al personaje seleccionado y regenera 350 pts. de Vida cada 5 segundos durante 30 s.

name: Paz y prosperidad
description: El plato especial de Ganyu. La figura del Chilin que descansa entre las flores da una sensación de tranquilidad. Ganyu imbuye este plato con sus mejores deseos, lo corona con pétalos de su flor favorita, la flor chingxin, y lo guarda para ti sin decir una palabra..
effect: Restaura un 40% de la Vida Máx. y 2350 pts. de Vida al personaje seleccionado.

name: Tortilla de papas en forma de garra
effect: Restaura 40% de la Vida máxima y 2350 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Carne de Mora Caelum Terra
effect: Revive un personaje y restaura 10% de su Vida máxima, además de 150 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Salteado de Chingtsé

normal.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread thoughout the Liyue region.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s.

delicious.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. Just catching a whiff is enough to work up one's appetite. The tingle of chili titillates the tongue. leaving you ready to devour ten bowls in a single sitting.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s.

suspicious.description: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. This one was a failed test run, being unpleasantly bitter and uncomfortably spicy. You could try mixing it with rice - or you could simply discard it and eat the rice instead.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s.

description: Un plato cocinado sobre un fuego vivo. Solo con olerlo es suficiente para abrir el apetito de cualquiera. El cosquilleo del chile activa las papilas gustativas, de repente, querrás comer diez tazones de arroz de golpe.
effect: Aumenta el ataque de los miembros del equipo en 160/194/228 durante 300s.

name: Sopa vegetariana de rábano

normal.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. Its flavor is delicately between tart and sweet. With luscious radish, it's a well-balanced dish.
normal.effect: Restores 9% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 260 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

delicious.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The clear aromas are perfectly accompanied by a sunny summer afternoon.
delicious.effect: Restores 10% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 300 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

suspicious.description: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.
suspicious.effect: Restores 8% of Max HP to the selected character. Regenerates 210 HP every 5s for the next 30s.

description: Sopa a base de rábano. Su aroma limpio es increíble, es el perfecto compañero para una tarde de verano.
effect: Restaura 8/9/10% de la Vida máxima de todos los miembros del equipo y regenera 210/260/300 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 300s.

name: Pollo rockero
effect: Aumenta la Prob. CRIT de todos los miembros del equipo en un 16% durante 300s. En Modo Multijugador, solo tendrá efecto en tus propios miembros.

name: Ensalada saludable

normal.description: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT rate by 9% for 300s.

delicious.description: A vegetable salad. Fresh, light and varied. You'd never get tired of eating this, even if you had to eat it for the rest of your life.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT rate by 12% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT rate by 6% for 300s.

description: Una ensalada muy fresca. Ligera, saludable y con muchos ingredientes diferentes. Nunca te cansarás de comerla. Tiene un sabor y textura diferentes con cada bocado.
effect: Aumenta la Probabilidad Crítica de todos los miembros del equipo un 6/9/12% durante 300s.

name: Matsutake salteados

normal.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. Cooked in butter, it's crisp outside yet tender inside. Eat it before someone steals it from you.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s.

delicious.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. So smooth and fragrant, eating them is like having the bursting vitality of spring absorbed into your stomach.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s.

suspicious.description: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. A shame that control of the fire was lost. Best you can do now is try to trick people who didn't see you cooking it into thinking they are just potato chips.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s.

description: Trozos de Matsutake salteados. Suaves y aromáticos. A medida que comas, sentirás como si la vitalidad de la primavera estuviera siendo absorbida por su estómago.
effect: Aumenta el ataque de todos los miembros del equipo en 160/194/228 durante 300s.

name: Sopa de brotes de bambú a fuego lento
description: El plato especial de Zhongli. Para el jamón se selecciona una pieza que cumpla los estándares de los banquetes del Pabellón Yuehai; la carne es la mejor que hayan cazado en la Aldea Aguaclara ese día y los brotes de bambú se eligen de entre los más tiernos de la Aldea Chingtsé. Se cocinan a fuego lento y el resultado es tan exquisito que solo lo comparte con quien sepa apreciarlo.
effect: Restaura un 34% de la Vida Máx. al personaje seleccionado y regenera 980 pts. de Vida cada 5 s durante 30 s.

name: Guisado picante
effect: Disminuye el consumo de aguante al correr para todos los miembros del equipo un 25% durante 1500s.

name: Pescado mandarín agridulce

normal.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP.

delicious.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is expertly handled to exhibit an elegant shape; however, the exquisitely balanced sweet-and-sour taste is really where the dish truly comes alive. The culinary skills involved in preparing this dish can impress even the greatest chefs of Liyue.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP.

suspicious.description: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. Sure, you can make out the shape of the fish, but you can't see how it's related to any squirrel. It just proves that the more complicated the dish is to prepare, the harder it is to prepare it well.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP.

description: Un intrincado plato de pescado. De textura regular y forma elegante, tiene la dulzura adecuada como el toque final. En muchos sentidos refleja la habilidad exquisita de un reconocido chef de Liyue.
effect: Restaura 30/32/34% de la Vida máxima y 600/1250/1900 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Filete a la barbacoa

normal.description: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.description: A grilled steak. Juicy, flavorsome, fragrant steak. One bite and you feel yourself come alive.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

suspicious.description: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

description: Un filete a la parrilla. Jugoso, con un increíble sabor. Dale un mordisco y te sentirás más vivo que nunca.
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 50/100/150 pts. de Vida.

name: Carne frita con zanahorias a la miel

normal.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The carrots take the gamey edge off the meat, and the sauce brings it all together sweetly. The perfect warm dish for a cold winter night.
normal.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The warm honey draws out the flavor of the meat, creating a flavor explosion akin to bathing in the warm summer sun.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party member's climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

description: Un plato de carne con salsa de miel. La salsa de miel sorprende por su explosión de sabores. Es como si estuvieras tomando el sol en un verano caluroso.
effect: Disminuye el consumo de aguante de los miembros del equipo al escalar y correr un 15/20/25% durante 900s.

name: Carne frita

normal.description: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat. The spiciness is as a blaze amidst a field of snow that ignites your appetite and leaves you craving more.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

suspicious.description: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

description: Carne silvestre a fuego alto. El picante es como una hoguera en la nieve, que al instante despierta el sentido del gusto. Es incluso adictivo.
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 50/100/150 pts. de Vida.

name: Delicias del Puerto de Piedra

normal.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 9% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. Wok-fried vegetarian food. The scents of the earth, the cool shade, and the moistness of the mist have all been enjoined into this plate of freshness. Pair it with simple white rice - both your taste buds and your soul shall experience a down-to-earth satisfaction many times over.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 12% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

suspicious.description: Wok-fried vegetarian food. Improper oil temperature control has caused the ingredients to reek of oil. Those who eat but a singlebite will shake their heads and mourn the loss of the rare violetgrass used.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

effect: Aumenta la tasa CRIT de todos los miembros del grupo en un 9% durante 300 s.

name: Solsettia
effect: Restaura 300 de Vida

name: Pescado salteado con mantequilla

normal.description: Gently fried fish dish. Cooked with the right heat and duration to maintain freshness for a long time. Tender and flaky, delicately browned thanks to the layer of aromatic butter on top, which creates a multi-layered and unique flavor.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 25% for 300s.

delicious.description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish melts in your mouth, melding the flavors of the land and sea together as it does, making for an unforgettable experience. Little wonder, then, that such a simply-made dish can make it into restaurants of great class.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 30% for 300s.

suspicious.description: Gently fried fish dish. The fish has been fried too long, which has deprived it of all its freshness and springiness. The slightest touch with your utensils might cause it to break into small pieces.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 20% for 300s.

description: Un pescado salteado a fuego lento. Al cocinarse con la potencia de fuego adecuada, el sabor del pescado conserva mejor su frescura. Es tierno y ligero, con una suave fragancia a mantequilla chamuscada, lo que lo dota de una gran variedad de texturas distintas..
effect: Aumenta la Protección de Escudo de todos los miembros del equipo en un 20%-30% durante 300s.

name: Pescado a la parrilla del superviviente
description: La especialidad de Keching. Este plato no fue preparado a la parrilla. En cambio, se frió desde adentro a través de la delicada aplicación de Electro. Una mordida suave revela un pescado fragante debajo de la piel ligeramente carbonizada, con un sabor perfectamente equilibrado. ¿Es así como sobrevive ella en la naturaleza? Realmente no puedes juzgar un libro por su portada.
effect: Restaura un 16% de Vida y 1350 pts. de Vida al personaje seleccionado.

name: Dulces Sueños
description: La especialidad de Xiao. Su sueño es muy simple y es simplemente un sueño encantador.
effect: Aumenta el Ataque del equipo en 114 por 300 segundos.

name: Pollo asado con miel

normal.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to compliment the tender fowl meat.
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP.

delicious.description: Honey-roasted fowl. Tender and sweet, the meat has perfectly fused with the honey, ensuring the only thing left of this dish will be the cleanly-picked bones.
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP.

suspicious.description: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP.

description: Pollo asado con miel. Suave y dulce, la carne y la miel se combinan creando un sabor extremadamente delicioso. ¡Querrás comer hasta los huesos!.
effect: Restaura 22% de la Vida Máxima y 900/1200/1500 pts. de Vida adicionales.

name: Panqueque

normal.description: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.description: A stack of round pancakes. Tender and fluffy, the sweet-smelling pancakes taste like clouds. A heavenly delicacy, no doubt.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.

suspicious.description: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

description: Un montón de panqueques. De forma, la textura y su sabor es inmejorable. La esponjosidad de su masa se parece al de las nubes celestiales.
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 250/400/550 puntos de vida.

name: Huevo frito crujiente de Teyvat
effect: Revive al personaje y restaura 10% de la vida máxima con 150 pts. de Vida adicionales

name: Huevo frito de Teyvat

normal.description: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

delicious.description: An egg fried on one side. With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 150 HP.

suspicious.description: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 50 HP.

description: Un huevo frito con la yema muy jugosa. Con un sabor a sol de verano, te vigoriza desde el primer bocado.
effect: Revive al personaje y restaura 50/100/150 pts. de Vida.

name: Carne estilo Tianshu

normal.description: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 30% and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s.

delicious.description: A braised meat dish. Its intense aroma can be detected from miles away. The ingredients look exquisite in every way, capturing the essence of its original design. It would not look out of place on a gourmet spread at Yuehai Pavilion.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 45% and CRIT Rate by 10% for 300s.

suspicious.description: A braised meat dish. It's been braised for too long, resulting in meat that's too soft. The fatty cuts are greasy enough to give you palpitations, and you can barely scarf them down when wrapped in the small lamp grass.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Physical DMG by 25% and CRIT Rate by 6% for 300s.

description: Un plato de carne estofada. La carne magra y la grasa se fríen con las especias en una sartén hasta que se vuelven crujientes. El resultado es suave y ligero, de un color translúcido. Se dice que es una obra maestra inventada por Tianshu, de alguna generación de las Siete Estrellas de Liyue, tras  arduas investigaciones.
effect: Aumenta el daño físico del equipo en un 25/35/45% y la probabilidad crítica un 6/8/10% durante 300 segundos.

name: Tiras de tres sabores

normal.description: A neatly arranged dish. The ham, fowl, and bamboo shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 25%.

delicious.description: A neatly arranged dish. The evenly-sized threads reveal exquisite knife-work. Rather than a dish, this seems more like a work of art. But once you work up the wherewithal to pick up those chopsticks and have at it, the delicious flavors will be utter bliss - leaving this as a mere work of art would be such a shame.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 30%.

suspicious.description: A neatly arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' Shield strength by 20%.

description: Un plato muy bien presentado. La uniformidad de las tiras revela la impecable técnica de cuchillo; parece una obra de arte. Cuando al fin te decides a probarlo, el exquisito sabor te produce alegría y tristeza a la vez; seria un desperdicio conservarlo como obra de arte.
effect: Aumenta la fuerza del escudo de los miembros del equipo un 20/25/30%.

name: Paz universal

normal.description: Colorful staple food. Maintains perfect balance between soft and fragrant rice and all kinds of carefully selected sweet ingredients. This dish is mainly known for its meaning as a symbol of prosperity and peace, and less so for its taste. However, with such noble ideals behind it, its flavor should not disappoint.
normal.effect: Restores 32% of Max HP and an additional 1,250 HP to the selected character.

delicious.description: Colorful staple food. The sweet-and-sour preserved fruit is bound to the rich mouthfeel of the rice as if by invisible threads. Even after you swallow, the faint fragrance remains on your lips, increasing your sense of satisfaction by an order of magnitude.
delicious.effect: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.

suspicious.description: Colorful staple food. Too much moisture was lost during the cooking process — at this point, it would take some imagination (and some extra water) to recoup the intended taste.
suspicious.effect: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

description: Un plato muy colorido. El sabor agridulce de la fruta desecada es como un hilo invisible que combina perfectamente con la fragancia del arroz. La ligera dulzura de cada bocado permanece en la lengua incluso después de tragar, y trae a quien lo prueba una placentera sensación de felicidad..
effect: Restaura un  30%/32%/34% de la Vida Máx. y 600/1250/1900 pts. de Vida al personaje seleccionado.

name: Abulón vegetariano

normal.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The matsutake has been sliced thin and fried till golden before pouring the sauce. The matsutake meat is sumptuous and has flavor to match that of fresh abalone — almost enough to make you think it was the real thing.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP

delicious.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. With the aid of the sauce, the matsutake has achieved an excellent, elegant mouth-feel that so rivals scallop in tenderness and abalone in freshness that you can hardly tell them apart. If you left your customer guessing before revealing the truth later, you would be sure to earn their astonished praise.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP

suspicious.description: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The overly thick sauce has totally covered the freshness that the ingredients should have had, and the condiment leaves your mouth dry no matter how much you wash it down with water.
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP

description: Una comida vegetariana de sabor intenso. El matsutake se corta en láminas, se saltea hasta que esté dorado y se mete en la salsa. Debido a su carnosa textura, comer matsutake es como comer un abulón muy fresco. Asi, al menos, podrás engañar un poco al estómago....
effect: Revive a un personaje y restaura 250/400/550 pts. de Vida.

name: Pescado hervido del Restaurante Wanmin
effect: Restaura 34% de la Vida máxima de un personaje y regenera 980 pts. de Vida cada 5s durante 30s.
base: Estofado de perca de lomo negro

name: Jugo de gancho de lobo
effect: Aumenta el ATK de todos los miembros del grupo en 114 durante 300 segundos.

name: Sueño silvano
description: Especialidad de Albedo. Las frutas y verduras están distribuidas como hierba y se mantienen altas como árboles. En este mundo en miniatura en un plato, rodeas la muralla moteada de la ciudad, sigues los callejones marrones y entras en el castillo de color naranja claro. Un sabor dulce y tierno luego brota como una flor en flor. Abres los ojos. Hay una sonrisa en los ojos del príncipe de pelo blanco.
effect: Aumenta la Protección de Escudo de todos los miembros del equipo en un 35% durante 300s.

name: Chop Suey de Zhongyuan

normal.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Though it contains animal organ meat and bits and scraps of other things, the strong-flavored seasonings have masked the stench of the meat. Many have had this dish for the entirety of their lives without knowing "chop suey" is actually a swear word in the local language.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. The authentic "Liyue taste" of this aromatic dish makes it a comfort food for golden-agers that may bring a tear to their eyes.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.

description: Un plato de carne asada sazonada. Aunque los ingredientes son principalmente vísceras y restos de animales, después de agregar condimentos y prepararlo, el olor original queda completamente oculto. Muchas personas han comido este plato toda su vida sin darse cuenta de su contenido.
effect: Disminuye el consumo de aguante al escalar y correr para todos los miembros del equipo un 15/20/25% durante 900s.
